TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract INodeServices implements class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: Represents the ability to invoke code in a Node.js environment. Although the underlying Node.js instance might change over time (e.g., the process might be restarted), the instance will remain constant.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task<T> InvokeAsync<T> (string moduleName, params object[] args);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<!!T> InvokeAsync<T>(string moduleName, object[] args) cil managed
Public Function InvokeAsync(Of T) (moduleName As String, ParamArray args As Object()) As Task(Of T)
abstract member InvokeAsync : string * obj[] -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task<'T>

Docs.typeparam: The JSON-serializable data type that the Node.js code will asynchronously return.
Docs.param: The path to the Node.js module (i.e., JavaScript file) relative to your project root whose default CommonJS export is the function to be invoked.
Any sequence of JSON-serializable arguments to be passed to the Node.js function.
Docs.summary: Asynchronously invokes code in the Node.js instance.
Docs.returns: A representing the completion of the RPC call.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task<T> InvokeAsync<T> (System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken, string moduleName, params object[] args);

Docs.typeparam: The JSON-serializable data type that the Node.js code will asynchronously return.
Docs.param: A that can be used to cancel the invocation.
The path to the Node.js module (i.e., JavaScript file) relative to your project root whose default CommonJS export is the function to be invoked.
Any sequence of JSON-serializable arguments to be passed to the Node.js function.
Docs.summary: Asynchronously invokes code in the Node.js instance.
Docs.returns: A representing the completion of the RPC call.

Public Function InvokeExportAsync(Of T) (moduleName As String, exportedFunctionName As String, ParamArray args As Object()) As Task(Of T)
abstract member InvokeExportAsync : string * string * obj[] -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task<'T>

Docs.typeparam: The JSON-serializable data type that the Node.js code will asynchronously return.
Docs.param: The path to the Node.js module (i.e., JavaScript file) relative to your project root that contains the code to be invoked.
Specifies the CommonJS export to be invoked.
Any sequence of JSON-serializable arguments to be passed to the Node.js function.
Docs.summary: Asynchronously invokes code in the Node.js instance.
Docs.returns: A representing the completion of the RPC call.
